plot outline: A murder happens during a night party.A big bad luck for the murderer is that the ace Detective Kiriti Roy is present during the time at the party and gets hold of the situation immediately."Ebong Kiriti" is a adaptation of Nihar Ranjan Gupta's "Rotibilap" ,a story that revolves round a murder and in presence of many witnesses.Still it is a mystery as to who is the killer!But none can escape the clutches of Kiriti.
title: Ebong Kiriti
plot: A detective story with mystery surrounding all the characters solved by the very smart and handsome Kiriti Roy who is one of the eminent fiction characters in Bengali Literature.

A murder happens during a night party.A big bad luck for the murderer is that the ace Detective Kiriti Roy is present during the time at the party and gets hold of the situation immediately."_Ebong Kiriti_ (qv)" is a adaptation of Nihar Ranjan Gupta's "Rotibilap" ,a story that revolves round a murder and in presence of many witnesses.Still it is a mystery as to who is the killer!But none can escape the clutches of Kiriti.::Samujjwal Ghosh
